# i-band LF from GAMA data, using L_sun assuming M_solar = 4.56
# as per Figure 10 of Baldry et al. 2012, MNRAS, 421, 621.
# number density is per dex per Mpc^3; assuming H0=70 km/s/Mpc.
# log luminosity, bin width, number density, error, number in sample.
